enWisdom: Espouse precautionary dissimulation for indeed it is a trait of the praiseworthy

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحَبَّنَا بِقَلْبِهِ وَأَبْغَضَنَا بِلِسَانِهِ فَهُوَ فِي الْجَنَّةِ
enWisdom: Whoever loves us with his heart but pretends to hate us with his tongue will go to Paradise

Wisdom: لَا دِينَ لِمَنْ لَا تَقِيَّةَ لَهُ
enWisdom: He who has no precautionary dissimulation has no religion
